title: Jewel Cave National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Items Worn in Other Caves outside of the Black Hills are Not Allowed.  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Items Worn in Other Caves outside of the Black Hills are Not Allowed.  A disease known as White-Nose Syndrome (WNS) is killing bat populations across the U.S.  To prevent the spread of WNS - do not wear shoes, clothing, or bring any gear into Jewel Cave that have been in other caves or mines.
